page.title: 10RECREATION GROUND BOREHAM
page.content: Donna an 11 year old writes about The Rec. We did a project on our Rec. because there was no good equipment.We visited the Rec. measured it drew plans, took photo's and wrote about it.We invited Parish Councillors to talk to us about money that could be spent on equipment.We also found out that there was some extra space, but that was to be used to extend the car park.We did surveys with children to find out which equipment was most popular.We made a book of our work and entered it for a competition run by The Daily Mirror. We had an exhibition of our work and invited Parish Councillors, parents, children and representatives from local newspapers.They took photo's and printed a piece the following week.They said that before adults buy equipment they should "Ask The Kids."
